item.description:
TOURNEY


Time: 6:30pm
Buyin: $20
Starting Stack:100,000 chips
Bonus Chips: 25,000 (arrive by 6:15pm)
One OPTIONAL Rebuy: $20 for 100K chips (if player busts before lvl 4)

One OPTIONAL Add-on:  $20 for 100K chips (at the end of lvl 3)
# of Players: up to 18 players on two tables
Eats: Pizza by 6:45pm, water, soda and snacks provided. Extra fridge if you want to BYOB.  Cost of food & drink taken from total prize pool.  Remainder paid out to players.

 

BLIND STRUCTURE - 20 min levels- all amounts in thousands

1/2k

2/4k

3/6k - Rebuys end/optional add-on available at end of level.

4/8k

5/10k

6/12k

8/16k -COLOR UP 1K CHIPS-

10/20k

15/30k

20/40k

25/50k - Final level, play until winner

Payouts

9 or less players 1st = 60% 2nd = 40%

10-18 players 1st = 50% 2nd = 30% 3rd = 20%


CASH GAME (should start between 8-9pm)


Stakes: 1/2 NL
Min Buyin: $40
Max Buyin: $300 (or largest stack @ table)

Button Bonus: $25 (awarded when game starts)
Bad Beat Jackpot: $275, qualifier is losing with 7's full
Player Referals: $20 for each new player you bring to the cash game
Note: Cash game has a dedicated dealer, tips are accepted and appreciated!

OTHER NOTES


- smoking at the bottom stairs of the deck please (will have a can there for butts)
- coats can go on the back of your chair (not on couch please)
- come in through side door at deck
- we have cats in case you suffer from allergies!
- you may wear your shoes inside, we'll swiffer the floors after the event

 

ADDRESS


2 Omelia Rd, East Windsor

Anthony's Home Phone:  860-292-8983
Anthony's Cell Phone:  860-597-3776


- house is on the corner of a four-way intersection with Rye Street. Big brick building, large yard. Driveway is between the yellow fire hydrant and the mailbox (there's also a bench by the tree next to the mailbox)

Cash game is first come-first served. Please RSVP to lockup a seat for the tourney!
item.how_to_find_us: House on corner of four-way intersection. Brick building, huge yard. Driveway between mailbox and yellow fire hydrant

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: $20 NL Hold Em Poker Tournament at Anthony's
